item.title: Altimmune Stock Soars Over 10% Premarket On Positive Mid-Stage Data For Liver Disease Treatment Drug
item.description: New 48-week data showed its dual-action drug outperformed placebo across key non-invasive liver tests.

item.title: As SpaceX IPO Speculation Builds, Is This New Space Stock Worth Watching?
item.description: Starfighters Space debuted on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) on December 18 under the ticker symbol ‘FJET’.

item.title: AbbVie, Merck, Other Top Drugmakers To Lower Prices Of US Drugs In MFN Deal With Trump Administration: Report
item.description: This comes after President Donald Trump urged drugmakers in July to lower drug prices for the U.S. government’s Medicaid program.

item.title: LUNR Stock In Spotlight On Trump’s Space Policy Blueprint – Retail Eyes ‘New Era’ For Intuitive Machines
item.description: On Thursday, Trump signed a sweeping space policy executive order, launching an ambitious blueprint aimed at reinforcing America’s dominance in space ...

item.title: Dan Ives Maps Tech’s 2026 AI Playbook: Lists Tesla, Apple, Microsoft As Major Beneficiaries
item.description: In a post on X, Ives framed AI not as a single trend, but as a multi-layered transformation in software, chips, and digital infrastructure.
